name: BNNSLayerParametersDropout
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of a dropout layer.

items.name: init(i_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, o_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, rate: Float, seed: UInt32, control: UInt8)
items.desc: Returns a new dropout layer parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new dropout layer parameters structure.

items.name: var rate: Float
items.desc: The probability that the layer drops out an element or a group of elements.

items.name: var seed: UInt32
items.desc: The seed for the random number generator which is ignored if zero.

items.name: var control: UInt8
items.desc: An 8-bit bit mask that indicates the dimension of the grouping of the dropout decision.
